Generated Narrative: CodeSystem us-ph-usage-context-type

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ecr/CodeSystem/us-ph-usage-context-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
priority PriorityThe priority designation of the reporting specifciation release (e.g. Routine, Emergent).
reporting ReportingThe reporting workflow step in which this artifact should be used.
specification-type Specification TypeThe type of specification this resource represents (e.g. Program Specification, or ValueSet Library).

name: USPPublicHealthUsageContextType
title: US Public Health Usage Context Type
description: This code system contains codes that identify the use context type of a ValueSet or Library.
